thread.title: BRIEF-Gozde Girisim Postpones IPO Of Unit Penta Teknoloji Due To Low Demand

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Gozde Girisim Postpones IPO Of Unit Penta Teknoloji Due To Low Demand
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - GOZDE GIRISIM:
* SAID ON SUNDAY POSTPONES IPO OF UNIT PENTA TEKNOLOJI DUE TO LOW DEMAND
